data.title: Talbot Mundy: Messenger of Destiny
data.meta_description: Edition: First Edition Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good Jacket Condition: Very Good Binding: Hardcover ISBN: 0937986461
data.text:
Edition: First Edition

Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good

Jacket Condition: Very Good

Binding: Hardcover

ISBN: 0937986461

First Edition, First Printing. Not price-clipped ($20.00 price intact). Published by Donald M. Grant Publisher, 1983. Quarto. Black cloth boards stamped in gold. Signed and inscribed by author on title page. Book is very good; with no writing or names. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight and pages crisp. Light stain and wrinkles on first few pages. Dust jacket is very good with shelf and edge wear. Small nicks along edges. 253 pages. ISBN: 0937986461.
